long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In a peaceful world, Darkmaw and an army of dark creatures from the Shadow Realm threaten the balance. Summoned by the powerful Monster Council, players must gather powerful Monsters to confront Darkmaw. They will venture into the Shadow Realm, join alliances, and ultimately face Darkmaw to protect the world from destruction. Through a thrilling and explorative journey, players must build a formidable team of monsters to tackle the ultimate challenge and restore peace.
